channel.title: Background for client (NOT asking for anyone to make me one)
channel.description: I have a bit of trouble with this client someone sent me. I tried to change the background and it turned out like this: [img]http://www.auto-rune.co.uk/images/client help.JPG[/img] What is the big square patch of pillar and how to i get rid of it? If you have msn will you please add me to your msn to help me. Thanks

item.title: Background for client (NOT asking for anyone to make me one)

item.description:

nah i flipped it ok, my other image works fine with it.

EDIT: On my other images theres still a big square
